title: How to Create a Second Yahoo Email Account: Web & Mobile

steps.title: Open the Yahoo Mail app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Yahoo Mail app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. Tap the Yahoo Mail app icon to open it. It is a white envelope against a purple background. Download the app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store if you have not already.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. You'll see this icon at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap + Add another mailbox.
steps.content: Tap + Add another mailbox . It's the first option on the menu. A list of mail providers will expand.

steps.title: Tap Yahoo.
steps.content: Tap Yahoo . It's toward the bottom of the list. You'll be taken to a Yahoo sign-in screen.

steps.title: Tap Create an account.
steps.content: Tap Create an account . It's the large oval button at the bottom of the sign-in page.

steps.title: Create a new Yahoo email.
steps.content: Create a new Yahoo email. Fill out the form to create a new Yahoo account. Pay particular attention to the New Yahoo email field, as this will become your new secondary email. Click Continue when you are ready.

steps.title: Review Yahoo's terms and tap Continue.
steps.content: Review Yahoo's terms and tap Continue . It's at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Text me a verification code.
steps.content: Tap Text me a verification code . This prompts Yahoo to send you a text message containing the code you'll use to verify your account. You can also tap Call me with a verification code if you rather not receive the code as a text.

steps.title: Enter the verification code and tap Verify.
steps.content: Enter the verification code and tap Verify . This code will be in the text message you receive from Yahoo. Once the code is verified, your new account will be ready to use.

steps.title: Sign in with your new Yahoo email account.
steps.content: Sign in with your new Yahoo email account. Now that you've created an account, you'll be prompted to sign in. Log in with your new username and password to link your new account to the Yahoo Mail app. If you don't see the option to sign in, tap Yahoo first to bring it up. Setting up a second email address this way allows you to create the account and link it to your previous one simultaneously.

steps.title: Create a second email account with Yahoo.
steps.content: Create a second email account with Yahoo. Before we can link a new Yahoo email with our current one, we must create a new account !

steps.title: Open your Yahoo inbox.
steps.content: Open your Yahoo inbox. Once you have two Yahoo email accounts, follow these steps to link them within the same login. Here's how to get to your mailbox: Click Mail in the upper-right corner of the page. Enter your Yahoo email address and password if prompted. If you've recently logged into Yahoo, you may not have to enter your email address and password.

steps.title: Click and select More Settings.
steps.content: Click and select More Settings . Tap the gear icon in the top-right corner of the page, and click on More Settings at the very bottom of the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Click Mailboxes.
steps.content: Click Mailboxes . It's in the menu on the left side of your screen.

steps.title: Click Add Mailbox.
steps.content: Click Add Mailbox . It is a large blue button under the Mailbox management menu.

steps.title: Select Yahoo as your second email provider.
steps.content: Select Yahoo as your second email provider. You can add a second email to your Yahoo Mail inbox from a variety of email providers, including Google, Outlook, Office 365, and AOL. We want to add a second Yahoo email, so click the Yahoo logo to continue.

steps.title: Enter your second Yahoo email address.
steps.content: Enter your second Yahoo email address. Type your second Yahoo email address (presumably the one you just created) into the given text field. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Sign in to your second Yahoo account.
steps.content: Sign in to your second Yahoo account. Once Yahoo recognizes your given email address, you will be prompted to sign into your account. Enter your password to continue. Yahoo will guide you through a series of on screen prompts to allow access to your account. Click through each of these prompts to complete the pairing of your two Yahoo inboxes.
